column1: * 1919 - Hilary Tolkien returns home after World War I.
* 1958 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes to Letter to Wordsworth (17 February 1958).
* 1963 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Julie Cape.
* 1991 – The third day of the first "Colloquium on the Languages of Middle-earth" at the house of Elvish Linguistic Fellowship member Bill Welden.
